text:
Badi | Barcelona | Backend Engineer (Ruby) | ONSITE | Ruby-on-Rails Badi is a young and dynamic start-up that wants to reshape the real-estate market! We are growing like crazy as we have launched our international expansion in 4 cities worldwide! We are looking for awesome developers to join us and help us conquer the world! We were recently included in the 100 Hottest start-ups in Europe on Wired Magazine!

Check out more! https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/918429014/

The Badi Tech Team
